long_description: The Smith Outlier Polarized sunglasses offer full coverage and a comfortable fit so you stay totally protected while wearing them for a full day on the slopes or on the high seas. Polarized carbonic polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. 6-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Smith Outlier frames are made from bio-plastic Rislan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, durable and consistent fit.
short_description: The Smith Outlier Polarized sunglasses offer full coverage and a comfortable fit so you stay totally protected while wearing them for a full day on the slopes or on the high seas.
